article_title: Jeff Smith's Tuki: Save The Humans, For Free Right Now
article_text:
After a webpage launch last year that Jeff Smith compares to that of Obamacare, Boneville.com has relaunched, with the full first season of Tuki: Save The Humans caveman webcomic available free. And even the Bones are happy about it.

The second season will begin on May 16th, with the first issue in black and white out in July.

article_summary:
After a webpage launch last year that Jeff Smith compares to that of Obamacare, Boneville.com has relaunched, with the full first season of Tuki: Save The Humans caveman webcomic available free.
The second season will begin on May 16th, with the first issue in black and white out in July.
And even the Bones are happy about it.
